general.slogan: Manage and control graphics for CasparCG and streaming applications.

pagetitle.selectshowextra: Add extra control to the project

config.addnewtip: Add new item by filling in and saving
config.addfirsttemplate: Click + to add a template to this project
config.addfirstextra: Click + to add an extra control to this project
config.authpolicy: User access configuration. Should username and password be used?
config.authinfo: This dialog will be shown if a username is set without a password in config-file.
config.authnone: Application does not require username or password.
config.extrabuttondescription: Simple push button which executes a function
config.extratoggledescription: Button with separate on and off states
config.javascriptfile: Path to javascript file in ASSETS folder
config.restartinfo: SPX process must be restarted for changes to have effect
config.templatepathinfo: Note, templates must be available to both CasparCG and SPX -servers. Configure this to be the CasparCG template folder or copy templatefiles to both applications if necessary.

error.preventBrowseUp: This is the root template folder.
error.templateDefinitionMissing: SPXGCTemplateDefinition{} missing from chosen file. Refer to section templates in documentation.

warning.showprofilebackup: It is recommended to make a backup copy of project file before making changes.
warning.notemplates: Go to project settings and add templates to project

hover.addccgserver: Add new CasparCG -server by entering NAME, IP and PORT -info
hover.browsetemplate: Browse for a new template to assign to this project
hover.browseextras: Browse for a new extra control to assign to this project
hover.ccghost: CasparCG server network name or IP-address
hover.colors: Extra control color in user interface
hover.dataformat: Data format to send to template
hover.dataroot: Data folder for storing project- and rundown files?
hover.defaultvalue: Default must be one of the available option values
hover.deletethis: Remove this item from the rundown
hover.deletepisode: Delete selected rundown including all content on it
hover.deleteshow: Delete selected project including settings and all rundowns
hover.duplicaterundown: Creates a duplicate of the selected rundown
hover.epslist: Select or doubleclick rundown to open it
hover.fcall: Event handler function in function library (for example helloWorld)
hover.htmlfolder: Absolute folder path to CasparCG template folder?
hover.importitems: Import multiple rundown items from a CSV -file
hover.item: Double click (or Enter) to open / close item editor. Drag to sort items.
hover.lang: User interface language? (You can create new language files to locales-folder as needed)
hover.loglevel: Logging level? Default level: info. Most log information: debug.
hover.mastercontinue: Continue animation to next step (Shift + Space). Only valid in templates with steps > 1.
hover.newversavailable: A newer version is available. Click to read more.
hover.openbrowser: Should Chrome browser launch at server startup?
hover.port: Application port to use? (For instance 3000 5000...) Please note: THIS PAGES ADDRESS will also change!
hover.playouturl: Web playout URL for streaming graphics applications.
hover.removeglobalextra: Remove this extra from all projects
hover.removetemplate: Remove this template from this project
hover.remoteplayouturl: Webrender installed to en external server. (Note, public IP addresses required)
hover.renameepisode: Change the name of the selected rundown
hover.replacetemplate: Re-import template from html file (changes will be overwritten with defaults)
hover.saveconfig: Save configurations to a config file
hover.showjsfile: Javascript function library of this project
hover.showlist: Select or doubleclick project to open it
hover.templatedescr: Short description of the item for the GUI
